description: Unique identifier for the navigation tree node.
Display sequence among sibling items in the hierarchy.
User-visible label shown for this menu item.
Reference to the localized text resource for the label; confirm with SME.
Identifier of this item’s parent, defining the tree structure.
Hierarchical level of the item, with root at level zero.
Image asset used when the item is expanded; likely from a shared catalog; confirm with SME.
Image asset used when the item is collapsed; likely from a shared catalog; confirm with SME.
Toolbar/breadcrumb image reference associated with the item; may be null; confirm with SME.
Application screen opened when the item is selected.
Flag controlling display behavior (e.g., visible page vs placeholder); semantics may vary; confirm with SME.
Destination window, frame, or route for navigation actions; often unused.
Auxiliary flag or parameter influencing behavior; exact use is implementation-specific; confirm with SME.
Composite UI styling metadata (such as color, icon key, size) used for rendering; confirm with SME.
Internal type or object code tied to the item’s action; likely references a catalog; confirm with SME.
Numeric reference to the registered screen to launch; likely a foreign key; confirm with SME.
Optional parameters passed to the launched screen, such as context, filters, or role.
Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent modification.
